idea: Petrasys offers a vibrant fiber-optic sensor technology to safeguard territories against third party intrusion. The customized detection system is an extensive solution against unauthorized infiltration into open borders or private property. Petrasys is an innovative technology driven industrial and mission-critical based start-up in India having diverse business interests. Our core portfolio comprises Information Technology, Sensing and Security. We are leading the transformation of technology in various segments with pioneering ventures in IT, Transportation, Defence, Oil & Gas, Energy, Forests and other sectors. PETRASYS affirms to pursue each prospect to contribute in the economic and social growth of India and beyond, while continuing its evolution as a global and friendly organization.
name: PETRASYS GLOBAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Tiranga Autotech India Private Limited is an Electric Vehicle Start-up with a vision to revolutionize the market of Scooter transportation using renewable energy sources.


Our dedicated team has combined in-depth knowledge with international expertise to bring value added services, exceptional technical support and unique tailored solutions. Through our experienced people, we introduce fresh ideas and innovation, which will be reflected on our E-Scooter and E cycle models.


Tiranga Autotech India Private Limited, incorporated in 2019, is a growing company, creating a dominance for itself in the 2-Wheeler E-Mobility segment with a pan-India presence.


Started by a team of industry professional, with over 10+ years of exposure in technology, marketing , manufacturing and servicing, Tiranga Autotech India Private Limited is serving in both rural and urban customers and we provide extensive technical support to all our customers.


Our strategic locations complement our customer service support, both pre and post sales, round the clock. We have worked rigorously in advanced tech & infra, with a focus on quality assurance at every step in order to provide seamless experience to our customers.


With a futuristic vision for 2- Wheelers E-Mobility segment, we build a state of art manufacturing facility to repay the debt that we owe to mother earth and to serve the society that we live in..


At Tiranga, we are passionate about Electric mobility and are looking to consolidate our position through improved and modern processes, infrastructure, partner engagement and technology.
name: TIRANGA AUTOTECH INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Reconcilia was started to innovate the bookkeeping and ancillary services. To introduce virtual accounting systems and compliance systems on already popular platforms. name: Reconcilia Corporate Services (OPC) Private Limited

idea: We are empowering all Retail Manufacturers by making their products penetrated in the market without the use of any Super Stockist, Stockist or even Distributor We are empowering Local Corner shops by giving them business from their locality without charging any fees or commissions for lifetime.
name: TROS ONLINE SHOPPING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: As a 17 year old, I aim to open a gaming cafe which provides an immersive experience for all gamers who either cannot afford a gaming PC or cannot find a cafe that suits their vibe.
name: WASD Gaming Cafe

idea: We are DIY meal kits providers of gourmet multi-cuisine recipes. This concept will allow people to realise their inner chef by simply opening our box of ingredients and prepping their favorite meal in 15 minutes
name: Supper

idea: We aim to make an ecommerce as well as classified platform where anything can be sold , mainly dealing with used products and we also aim to include other domains like refurbished , sale ,rental , eco-friendly ,exchange offers etc .We aim to provide door to door pickup , assurance and delivery services to our customers. We act as a link between the seller and the buyer,preventing the risk of any kind of fraudulance .We will use C2C model for used products, whereas we also target local retail shops to broadcast their products in a B2C model. The C2C model revenue generation would be delivery service charges, whereas B2C model would be subscription based.
name: Bech Daal

idea:
Vara Worldwide Outsourcing Services Pvt Ltd is located in Mumbai, provides B to B services like Database management, Contact list management, CRM database management, Web Research, Email marketing, Tele-calling, Lead generation, Inside Sales, Business Development, Sales & Marketing services.

Our focus is to provide Outsourcing services at a very affordable price to our clients across various industries.
name: VARA WORLDWIDE OUTSOURCING SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
There is no streamlined process for receiving cashless donations by religious institutes. It is the only sector which was not consolidated in lines with Hon'ble PM's vision of 'cashless economy'.


Through Dana, we have endeavoured to create a consolidated platform for all religious institutions to receive donations from across the world directly into their respective bank accounts.

Features for Religious Institutions:
 1. Cashless transaction
2. Addition of another gateway for donation
3. Wide access to the donors across the world
4. Donations throughout the year from all parts of the world.
Features for Donors:
1. Cashless transaction
2. Verified & Registered Religious Institutions
3. Instant Receipt
4. No need to visit the Institutions
5. Eliminating the risk of fraud
name: DANA ENDEAVOUR LLP
